content: Wow I demonstrated against the visa ban, but I would be a fool to believe I could change the world simply by holding up a sign. Nor did I do it for some sort of cathartic experience. I showed up because Muslim families live in my apartment building and many of my other neighbors are immigrants or here on student or work visas. I showed up for them. So that they would know there are people who welcome them and who will look out for them. I could care less if we make the news. People in my community saw me and that’s where you can make the biggest difference.
